mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT IEM_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_IEM_ID = A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID ) IEM_CN, COUNT(A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID) QUSTNR_IEM_ID_CNT, ROUND((100/(SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = #{qestnrQesitmId})) * COUNT(A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID)) QUSTNR_PERCENT FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = #{qestnrQesitmId} GROUP BY A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID
SELECT RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, ETC_ANSWER_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = #{qestnrQesitmId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNQUSTNRQESITM SET QESTN_SN=#{qestnSn}, QESTN_TY_CODE=#{qestnTyCode}, QESTN_CN=#{qestnCn}, MXMM_CHOISE_CO=#{mxmmChoiseCo}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = #{qestnrQesitmId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO WHERE QESTNR_ID=A.QESTNR_ID) QESTNR_SJ, A.QESTN_SN, A.QESTN_TY_CODE, A.QESTN_CN, A.MXMM_CHOISE_CO, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM A WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = #{qestnrQesitmId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE 1=1
AND QESTN_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND MXMM_CHOISE_CO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNQUSTNRQESITM ( QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, QESTNR_ID, QESTN_SN, QESTN_TY_CODE, QESTN_CN, MXMM_CHOISE_CO, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrQesitmId}, #{qestnrId}, #{qestnSn}, #{qestnTyCode}, #{qestnCn}, #{mxmmChoiseCo}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{lastUpdusrId} )
